scripts.stop: pkill -f 'python run_devui.py' && pkill -f 'uvicorn' && rm -f .agent.pid || echo 'No agent running'
scripts.restart: bun run stop && sleep 2 && bun run agent
scripts.status: lsof -i :8080 || echo 'No agent running on port 8080'
scripts.setup: python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install --pre -r requirements.txt && echo 'âœ… Setup complete! Run: bun run agent'
